attributes.action: Immediately pass legislation to allow all former, current and future Gurkha soldiers to reside in the UK should they wish to.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Immediately pass legislation to allow all former, current and future Gurkha soldiers to reside in the UK should they wish to.

We support the efforts of Joanna Lumley's petition on the same isue in all respects.

rejection.details: This petition overlaps with several already in existence:  http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/Gurkha-soldiers/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
